summary: Senior Software Engineer with 4+ years designing and implementing enterprise systems for healthcare, government, and media. Expertise in full-stack development, system architecture, and team collaboration. Delivered multiple production systems and improved operational workflows through targeted technology decisions.

work.name: Mereb Technologies
highlights: Overseeing customization, implementation and deployment of a Bahmni-based EMR (LeanHealth) integrated with Odoo ERP and OpenMRS to support end-to-end clinical workflows including registration, triage, appointments, pharmacy, billing, and labs.
Developed several custom Odoo modules to support automated quotation generation, sales attribution, and payment integration.
Implemented an SMS notification microservice used for timely delivery of lab results and appointment reminders, handling high-volume communication flows.
Designed and maintained containerized infrastructure using Docker and Nginx reverse proxy to support environment-based deployments and secure hosting.
Planned and executed migrations of large patient datasets from legacy systems, ensuring data mapping and integrity validation during CSV import workflows.

work.name: Amref Health Africa
highlights: Architected and delivered a Telegram-based polling and feedback collection system used by health teams for real-time data capture and staff engagement.
Designed a scalable collection pipeline with automated scheduling, multilingual support, and session management to improve participation and data quality.
Built a secure NestJS REST API integrated with Looker Studio using a custom connector to enable interactive dashboards and automated reporting for stakeholders.
Collaborated with program teams to define KPIs and surface actionable insights through dashboards and reports.

work.name: 360Ground
highlights: Led architecture and implementation of microservices for national statistics and market information projects, working closely with international partners and government teams.
Built dashboards and mobile components for improved data collection and public access to statistical information.
Implemented real-time features for a live TV show and associated audience interaction systems designed to support large concurrent user traffic.
Planned and executed migrations from cloud to on-premise infrastructure to reduce operational costs and meet data sovereignty requirements.

work.name: SoftDeveloper
highlights: Built and documented RESTful APIs for 'Suitor' CRM, automating communications and streamlining order workflows for a rental business client.
Implemented batch ordering and automated report generation to reduce manual work and improve operational efficiency.

work.name: Meklit Technologies
highlights: Developed a full-stack sports analytics application to manage tracking and scheduling workflows and integrate automated analysis for faster insights.
Authored system documentation including SRS and high-level architecture artifacts to align multiple teams around project goals.

education.institution: Addis Ababa Science and Technology University
education.studyType: Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering
